column1: Uchi////BEWARE:  This is one of those restaurants where they DONT ALLOW you to alter their menu.  It is what it is
column2: take it or leave it.  Most of the time
column3: or rather ALL of the time
column4: I have an issue with this type of behaviour.  It's really rubs me the wrong way.  But
column5: this restaurant was an exception.  The combinations of ingredients and the way they balance all the flavors and round them out into a complete whole...... you would have to be a culinary genius to subtract/add something from/to a dish and expect a good result.  In FACT
column6: it's not allowed so that people don't ruin a perfectly well designed
column9: tested dish and then go on Yelp and totally destroy their reputation.  I see why.
